alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; Henry; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fayette, northwestern Henry, south central Fulton and Clayton Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Riverdale, or near Jonesboro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, East Point, Stockbridge, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, College Park, Morrow, Lake City, Hartsfield-Jackson Airport, Lake Spivey, Rex, Ellenwood, Hidden Valley Park, Fort Gillem, Flippen, and Conley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
